typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string (''),
	adf_name as string (''),
	date as string ('1899-01-01 00:00:00.000')
}
source(output(
		ARPT_NAME as string,
		ARPT_CITY as string,
		ARPT_CNTRY as string,
		ARPT_IATA_CD as string,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD as string,
		ARPT_LAT as double,
		ARPT_LONG as double,
		ARPT_ALTD as string,
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET as double,
		ARPT_DST as string,
		ARPT_TZONE as string,
		LAST_UPDT_DT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> ArptBlob
Filter1 derive(ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id,
		ADF_TIME_STMP = currentTimestamp(),
		ADF_PIPLN_NAME = $adf_name,
		LAST_UPDT_DT = toDate('1900-01-01')) ~> AddADFColumns
ArptBlob filter(toDate(LAST_UPDT_DT)  > toDate($date)) ~> Filter1
AddADFColumns sink(input(
		ARPT_NAME as string,
		ARPT_CITY as string,
		ARPT_CNTRY as string,
		ARPT_IATA_CD as string,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD as string,
		ARPT_LAT as double,
		ARPT_LONG as double,
		ARPT_ALTD as integer,
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET as double,
		ARPT_DST as string,
		ARPT_TZONE as string,
		LAST_UPDT_DT as date,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ARPT_NAME,
		ARPT_CITY,
		ARPT_CNTRY,
		ARPT_IATA_CD,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD,
		ARPT_LAT,
		ARPT_LONG,
		ARPT_ALTD,
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET,
		ARPT_DST,
		ARPT_TZONE,
		LAST_UPDT_DT,
		ADF_RUN_ID,
		ADF_TIME_STMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> StgAirports
